metadata.Title: CVE-2014-6054 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The rfbProcessClientNormalMessage function in libvncserver/rfbserver.c inLibVNCServer 0.9.9 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (divide-by-zero error and server crash) via a zero value in thescaling factor in a (1) PalmVNCSetScaleFactor or (2) SetScale message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-6054` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

italc-client - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
italc-management-console - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
italc-master - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
libitalccore - 1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: italc package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:2.0.2+dfsg1-4ubuntu0.1').
